name: rok-plugin-marketplace
description: ROK Copilot plugins for Claude Code: development workflows, session management, R-P-I methodology, and agency orchestration patterns.

plugins.name: rok-genesis-core
plugins.description: ROK Copilot core conventions: session management, clean compaction, learning capture with diary/reflect, project initialization with Genesis templates (Next.js + Supabase + Tailwind), and development workflow standards.

plugins.name: rok-rpi-workflow
plugins.description: Research-Plan-Implement (R-P-I) development methodology. Three-phase workflow: research gathers information, plan creates blueprints for approval, implement executes with validation. Includes complexity assessment and pre-implementation protocol.

plugins.name: rok-agency-workflows
plugins.description: Agency workflow patterns: multi-agent orchestration with dispatch, task delegation with spawn-agent, cross-session memory management, browser-based UI validation, PRD generation, and feature list tracking.

plugins.name: adjuster-prospecting
plugins.description: Insurance adjuster prospecting for restoration companies. Find carrier adjusters by territory, build profiles, draft outreach, and track relationship pipeline. Built for DMV area restoration businesses.

plugins.name: contractor-prospecting
plugins.description: Contractor referral prospecting for specialty restoration companies. Find GCs and restoration contractors, build profiles, draft partnership outreach, and track referral pipeline. Built for DMV area.

plugins.name: lead-enrichment
plugins.description: Enrich business leads with company intelligence, contact discovery, and validation for the restoration industry. Research companies, validate emails and phone numbers, generate enrichment reports, and export to Excel/PDF.
